THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement: The thumbnail directly reinforces the title: it visually represents an RJ (radio jockey) named Saurabh in a comically exaggerated, animated form, matching the 'Make Joke Of' theme. The radio studio, mixing desk, and the Pig FM sign all fit the RJ concept. The MJO and Pig FM brands strengthen association with parody or comedic content.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: There are no major mismatches; both title and thumbnail promise a humorous, animated radio jockey sketch involving 'RJ Saurabh' and 'Make Joke Of'. The thumbnail style is consistent with comedic/parody presentation, which matches the branding and expectations set by the title.
